alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, or 16 miles northwest of Sunrise, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County
